effect.Name: Difference
effect.description: Difference - It compares the colors and subtracts them from each other. When the colors on are identical, the resulting color will be black, and when the colors are different, bright colors are obtained
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Difference (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: It compares the colors and subtracts them from each other. When the colors on are identical, the resulting color will be black, and when the colors are different, bright colors are obtained

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
